question: 知り合い
sourceMnemonic: You've probably seen the words <ja>知る</ja> and <ja>合う</ja> by now. This is someone you "know" because you have "come together" before, but that's pretty much it. You don't really know them well, you just met them a couple times so you know who they are. This person is an <vocabulary>acquaintance</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings are that of <ja>知る</ja> and <ja>合う</ja>. So long as you know those words, you should be able to read this one too.
